summary.span: 表示組件的版本號碼、作業系統或 Common Language Runtime。

span.span: Represents the version number of an assembly, operating system, or the common language runtime.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 版本號碼是由二到四個元件所組成： 主要、 次要、 組建和修訂。Version numbers consist of two to four components: major, minor, build, and revision. 主要和次要元件是必要的資訊;組建和修訂元件是選擇性的但建置元件是必要的如果已定義的修訂元件。The major and minor components are required; the build and revision components are optional, but the build component is required if the revision component is defined. 定義的所有元件都必須都是大於或等於 0 的整數。All defined components must be integers greater than or equal to 0. 版本號碼的格式如下所示 (選擇性元件會顯示在方括號 （[和]）：The format of the version number is as follows (optional components are shown in square brackets ([ and ]): *主要*。*次要*[。*建置*[。*修訂*]]*major*.*minor*[.*build*[.*revision*]] 元件會使用慣例，如下所示：The components are used by convention as follows: - *主要*:具有相同名稱但不同的主要版本的組件不能互換。*Major*: Assemblies with the same name but different major versions are not interchangeable. 較高的版本號碼可能表示主要產品，其中不能假設回溯相容性重寫。A higher version number might indicate a major rewrite of a product where backward compatibility cannot be assumed. - *次要*:如果兩個組件的主要版本號碼與名稱相同，但是次要版本號碼不同，這表示區分，用意在於提供回溯相容性的重大增強功能。*Minor*: If the name and major version number on two assemblies are the same, but the minor version number is different, this indicates significant enhancement with the intention of backward compatibility. 這個較高的次要版本號碼可能表示點發行版本的產品或產品的完整的回溯相容性新版本。This higher minor version number might indicate a point release of a product or a fully backward-compatible new version of a product. - *組建*：組建編號的差異表示相同的來源重新編譯。*Build*: A difference in build number represents a recompilation of the same source. 處理器、 平台或編譯器變更時，可能會使用不同的組建編號。Different build numbers might be used when the processor, platform, or compiler changes. - *修訂*:主要，具有相同的名稱，組件，而次要版本號碼，但不同的修訂主要做為完全可以互換。*Revision*: Assemblies with the same name, major, and minor version numbers but different revisions are intended to be fully interchangeable. 更高版本的修訂編號可能會用於修正安全性漏洞的先前發行的組件中的組建。A higher revision number might be used in a build that fixes a security hole in a previously released assembly. 後續版本的組件不同的組建或修訂的數字只會被視為舊版本的 Hotfix 更新。Subsequent versions of an assembly that differ only by build or revision numbers are considered to be Hotfix updates of the prior version. > [!IMPORTANT] > 值尚未明確指派值的屬性是未定義 (-1)。The value of properties that have not been explicitly assigned a value is undefined (-1). 從.NET Framework 2.0和屬性可讓您識別您的應用程式，比方說，更正問題，直到您可以釋放永久解決方案的暫存版本。Starting with .NET Framework 2.0, the and properties enable you to identify a temporary version of your application that, for example, corrects a problem until you can release a permanent solution. 此外，Windows NT 作業系統使用編碼 service pack 號碼的屬性。Furthermore, the Windows NT operating system uses the property to encode the service pack number. ## 指派給組件的版本資訊Assigning Version Information to Assemblies 一般情況下，類別不會用來將版本號碼指派給組件。Ordinarily, the class is not used to assign a version number to an assembly. 相反地，類別用來定義組件的版本，如本主題中範例所示。Instead, the class is used to define an assembly's version, as illustrated by the example in this topic. ## 擷取版本資訊Retrieving Version Information 物件最常用來儲存某些系統或應用程式元件 （例如作業系統）、 通用語言執行平台、 目前的應用程式可執行檔或特定組件的版本資訊。 objects are most frequently used to store version information about some system or application component (such as the operating system), the common language runtime, the current application's executable, or a particular assembly. 下列範例會說明一些最常見的案例：The following examples illustrate some of the most common scenarios: - 正在擷取的作業系統版本。Retrieving the operating system version. 下列範例會使用屬性，以擷取作業系統的版本號碼。The following example uses the property to retrieve the version number of the operating system. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/cs/GettingVersions1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/vb/GettingVersions1.vb#1)] - 擷取通用語言執行平台的版本。Retrieving the version of the common language runtime. 下列範例會使用屬性，以擷取有關 common language runtime 的版本資訊。The following example uses the property to retrieve version information about the common language runtime. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/cs/GettingVersions1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/vb/GettingVersions1.vb#2)] - 擷取目前的應用程式組件版本。Retrieving the current application's assembly version. 下列範例會使用方法，以取得參考物件，表示應用程式可執行檔，並接著會擷取其組件版本號碼。The following example uses the method to obtain a reference to an object that represents the application executable and then retrieves its assembly version number. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/cs/currentapp.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/vb/currentapp.vb#5)] - 擷取目前的組件的組件版本。Retrieving the current assembly's assembly version. 下列範例會使用屬性，以取得參考物件，表示包含應用程式的進入點，然後擷取其版本資訊之組件。The following example uses the property to obtain a reference to an object that represents the assembly that contains the application entry point, and then retrieves its version information. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/cs/currentassem.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/vb/currentassem.vb#4)] - 擷取特定的組件的版本。Retrieving the version of a specific assembly. 下列範例會使用方法，以取得參考具有特定的檔案名稱，並接著會擷取其版本資訊的物件。The following example uses the method to obtain a reference to an object that has a particular file name, and then retrieves its version information. 請注意，來具現化也有數個其他方法依檔案名稱或強式名稱的物件。Note that several other methods also exist to instantiate an object by file name or by strong name. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/cs/specificassem.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/vb/specificassem.vb#3)] - 正在擷取發行 ClickOnce 應用程式版本。Retrieving the Publish Version of a ClickOnce application. 下列範例會使用屬性來顯示應用程式的發行版本。The following example uses the property to display an application's Publish Version. 請注意其成功執行，需要設定的範例應用程式身分識別。Note that its successful execution requires the example's application identity to be set. 這是由 Visual Studio 發行精靈會自動進行處理。This is handled automatically by the Visual Studio Publish Wizard. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/cs/clickonce.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/vb/clickonce.vb#7)] > [!IMPORTANT] > ClickOnce 部署的應用程式的發行版本是完全獨立於其組件版本。The Publish Version of an application for ClickOnce deployment is completely independent of its assembly version. ## 比較版本物件Comparing Version Objects 您可以使用方法，以判斷某個物件是早於、 同於或晚於第二個物件。You can use the method to determine whether one object is earlier than, the same as, or later than a second object. 下列範例會指出版本 2.1 晚於 2.0 版。The following example indicates that Version 2.1 is later than Version 2.0. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Class.Comparing#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.class.comparing/cs/comparisons1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Class.Comparing#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.class.comparing/vb/comparisons1.vb#1)] 兩個版本視為相同，主要、 次要、 建置和修訂編號的第一個物件必須是完全相同的第二個物件。For two versions to be equal, the major, minor, build, and revision numbers of the first object must be identical to those of the second object. 如果組建或修訂數目物件是未定義，所物件會被視為是早於物件其組建或修訂編號等於零。If the build or revision number of a object is undefined, that object is considered to be earlier than a object whose build or revision number is equal to zero. 下列範例將說明這藉由比較三個有未定義的版本元件的物件。The following example illustrates this by comparing three objects that have undefined version components. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Class.Comparing#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.class.comparing/cs/comparisons2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Class.Comparing#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.class.comparing/vb/comparisons2.vb#2)] ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來指定組件的版本號碼。The following example uses the attribute to assign a version number to an assembly. 在編譯時期，此版本資訊會儲存與組件的中繼資料。At compile time, this version information is stored with the assembly's metadata. 在執行階段，此範例將擷取的值以取得執行的組件的參考組件中找到的型別上的屬性，而且會擷取從組件的版本資訊屬性所傳回的物件方法。At run time, the example retrieves the value of the property on a type found in the assembly to get a reference to the executing assembly, and it retrieves the assembly's version information from the property of the object returned by the method. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/cs/example1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Version.Class/vb/example1.vb#6)]

param.name: version
param.span: 包含主要、次要、組建和修訂編號的字串，其中每個編號以句號字元 ('.') 隔開。

span.span: A string containing the major, minor, build, and revision numbers, where each number is delimited with a period character ('.').

summary.span: 以指定的字串初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `version`參數可以包含僅元件的主要、 次要、 組建和修訂，依照該順序，以及所有以句號分隔。The `version` parameter can contain only the components major, minor, build, and revision, in that order, and all separated by periods. 必須至少兩個元件，且最多四個。There must be at least two components, and at most four. 前兩個元件都假設為主要和次要。The first two components are assumed to be major and minor. 未指定元件的值未定義。The value of unspecified components is undefined. 版本號碼的格式如下所示。The format of the version number is as follows. 選用的元件會顯示在方括號 ('['和']'):Optional components are shown in square brackets ('[' and ']'): major.minor[.build[.revision]]major.minor[.build[.revision]] 定義的所有元件都必須都是大於或等於 0 的整數。All defined components must be integers greater than or equal to 0. 比方說，如果主要版本號碼為 6，而次要號碼是 2、 組建編號為 1，和修訂編號為 3，然後`version`應該是 「 6.2.1.3 」。For example, if the major number is 6, the minor number is 2, the build number is 1, and the revision number is 3, then `version` should be "6.2.1.3".

exception.span: 具有兩個以下的元件或四個以上的元件。

span.span: has fewer than two components or more than four components.
is .

exception.span: 主要、次要、組建或修訂元件小於零。

span.span: A major, minor, build, or revision component is less than zero.

exception.span: 至少有一個 的元件未剖析成整數。

span.span: At least one component of does not parse to an integer.

exception.span: 至少有一個 的元件表示大於 的數字。

span.span: At least one component of represents a number greater than .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 比方說，如果版本號碼為 6.2.1.3，組建編號為 1。For example, if the version number is 6.2.1.3, the build number is 1. 如果版本號碼為 6.2，組建編號未定義。If the version number is 6.2, the build number is undefined. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範建構函式，並， ， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the constructor, and , , , , , and properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 組成`Version`重要性的遞減順序為： 主要、 次要、 組建和修訂。The components of `Version` in decreasing order of importance are: major, minor, build, and revision. 未知的元件被假設為超過任何已知的元件。An unknown component is assumed to be older than any known component. 例如：For example: - 1.1 版是 1.1.0 版Version 1.1 is older than version 1.1.0 - 1.1 版是了 1.1.1 版以前Version 1.1 is older than version 1.1.1 - 1.1 版是 1.1.2.3 版Version 1.1 is older than version 1.1.2.3 - 1.1.2 版是 1.1.2.4 版Version 1.1.2 is older than version 1.1.2.4 - 1.2.5 版是較新版本 1.2.3.4Version 1.2.5 is newer than version 1.2.3.4

span.span: is not of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會實作介面，並執行稍微優於方法因為並沒有要 unbox`value`參數。This method implements the interface, and performs slightly better than the method because it does not have to unbox the `value` parameter. 組成`Version`重要性的遞減順序為： 主要、 次要、 組建和修訂。The components of `Version` in decreasing order of importance are: major, minor, build, and revision. 未知的元件被假設為超過任何已知的元件。An unknown component is assumed to be older than any known component. 例如：For example: - 1.1 版是 1.1.0 版。Version 1.1 is older than version 1.1.0. - 1.1 版是了 1.1.1 版以前的。Version 1.1 is older than version 1.1.1. - 1.1 版是 1.1.2.3 版。Version 1.1 is older than version 1.1.2.3. - 1.1.2 版是 1.1.2.4 版。Version 1.1.2 is older than version 1.1.2.4. - 1.2.5 版本是比版本 1.2.3.4 還新。Version 1.2.5 is newer than version 1.2.3.4. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範泛型和非泛型版本`CompareTo`數的值和參考類型的方法。The following code example demonstrates generic and nongeneric versions of the `CompareTo` method for several value and reference types. [!code-cpp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CPP/cat.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/CS/cat.cs#1)] [!code-vb[T.CompareTo#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/T.CompareTo/VB/cat.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets the high 16 bits of the revision number.
A 16-bit signed integer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 假設發行您的應用程式暫時更正問題，直到您可以釋放永久解決方案的過渡版本。Suppose you release an interim version of your application to temporarily correct a problem until you can release a permanent solution. 暫存的版本不保證新的修訂編號，但卻必須能被識別為不同的版本。The temporary version does not warrant a new revision number, but it does need to be identified as a different version. 在此情況下，將編碼的 32 位元的修訂編號的最高和最低的 16 位元部分的識別資訊。In this case, encode the identification information in the high and low 16-bit portions of the 32-bit revision number. 使用 屬性，以取得整個修訂的數字，使用屬性，以取得高 16 位元，並使用屬性，以取得低 16 位元。Use the property to obtain the entire revision number, use the property to obtain the high 16 bits, and use the property to obtain the low 16 bits. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版中，作業系統的系統用途的 Windows NT編碼 service pack 號碼的屬性。Starting in the .NET Framework version 2.0, the Windows NT operating system uses the property to encode the service pack number. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範建構函式，而， ， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the constructor, and the , , , , , and properties. [!code-cpp[system.version.revision#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.revision/cpp/rev.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[system.version.revision#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.revision/cs/rev.cs#1)] [!code-vb[system.version.revision#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.revision/vb/rev.vb#1)]

param.name: input
param.span: 字串，包含要轉換的版本號碼。

span.span: A string that contains a version number to convert.

summary.span: 將版本號碼的字串表示轉換為對等的 物件。

span.span: Converts the string representation of a version number to an equivalent object.

returns.span: 物件，相當於 參數中指定的版本號碼。

span.span: An object that is equivalent to the version number specified in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `input`參數必須要有下列格式：The `input` parameter must have the following format: ``` major.minor[.build[.revision]] ``` 其中*主要*，*次要*，*建置*，以及*修訂*是版本的字串表示數字的四個元件： 主要版本號碼、 次要版本號碼、 組建編號和修訂編號。where *major*, *minor*, *build*, and *revision* are the string representations of the version number's four components: major version number, minor version number, build number, and revision number. 選用的元件會顯示在方括號 （[和]）。Optional components are shown in square brackets ([ and ]). 元件必須出現在指定的順序，而且必須以句點分隔。The components must appear in the specified order, and must be separated by periods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 因為可辨識的模式必須符合的版本號碼的字串表示，應用程式時應該一律使用例外狀況處理呼叫方法來剖析使用者輸入。Because the string representation of a version number must conform to a recognized pattern, applications should always use exception handling when calling the method to parse user input. 或者，您可以呼叫方法來剖析版本號碼的字串表示，並傳回值，指出剖析作業是否成功。Alternatively, you can call the method to parse the string representation of a version number and return a value that indicates whether the parse operation succeeded. 方法是很便利的方法，它就相當於呼叫建構函式。The method is a convenience method; it is equivalent to calling the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來剖析包含版本資訊的字串數目。The following example uses the method to parse a number of strings that contain version information. [!code-csharp[System.Version.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.parse/cs/parse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Version.Parse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.parse/vb/parse1.vb#1)]

span.span: is .

exception.span: 具有兩個以下或四個以上的版本元件。

span.span: has fewer than two or more than four version components.

exception.span: 至少 中的一個元件小於零。

span.span: At least one component in is less than zero.

exception.span: 至少 中的一個元件不是整數。

span.span: At least one component in is not an integer.

exception.span: 至少 中的一個元件表示大於 的數字。

span.span: At least one component in represents a number that is greater than .

param.name: input
param.span: 字串，包含要轉換的版本號碼。

span.span: A string that contains a version number to convert.

param.span: 當這個方法傳回時，如果轉換成功，則會包含 ，相當於 所包含的數字。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the equivalent of the number that is contained in , if the conversion succeeded.

summary.span: 嘗試將版本號碼的字串表示轉換為對等的 物件，並傳回表示轉換是否成功的值。

span.span: Tries to convert the string representation of a version number to an equivalent object, and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.

returns.span: 如果 參數轉換成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the parameter was converted successfully; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是類似於方法，但是它不會擲回例外狀況如果轉換失敗。The method is similar to the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 相反地，它會傳回`false`如果`input`為 null，則具有少於兩個或多個四個元件，不是整數的至少一個元件，至少一個元件小於零，或大於的至少一個元件.Instead, it returns `false` if `input` is null, has fewer than two or more than four components, has at least one component that is not an integer, has at least one component that is less than zero, or has at least one component that is greater than . 剖析作業成功，`input`參數必須以下列格式：For the parse operation to succeed, the `input` parameter must be in the following format: ``` major.minor[.build[.revision]] ``` 其中*主要*，*次要*，*建置*，以及*修訂*是版本的字串表示數字的四個元件： 主要版本號碼、 次要版本號碼、 組建編號和修訂編號。where *major*, *minor*, *build*, and *revision* are the string representations of the version number's four components: major version number, minor version number, build number, and revision number. 選用的元件會顯示在方括號 （[和]）。Optional components are shown in square brackets ([ and ]). 元件必須出現在順序，而且必須以句點分隔。The components must appear in order, and must be separated by periods. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來剖析包含版本資訊的字串數目。The following example uses the method to parse a number of strings that contain version information. [!code-csharp[System.Version.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.tryparse/cs/tryparse1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Version.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.version.tryparse/vb/tryparse1.vb#1)]
